about_the_game: Beware of appearances, SPAM is not your ordinary card game... Discover a new way to face the world or challenge your friends directly. Fast-paced, dynamic duels will allow you to climb the ladder and improve your champion collection, expanding your possibilities and letting you craft strategies as original as they are numerous. The goal is simple: push your deck-building and adaptation skills to the limit. The many champion abilities, along with their passives, offer this opportunity. Rest assured, with SPAM, monotony doesn't exist. You'll need numerous qualities to gain the upper hand on your opponent. So, step into the arena and become the best Spamer!
detailed_description: Beware of appearances, SPAM is not your ordinary card game... Discover a new way to face the world or challenge your friends directly. Fast-paced, dynamic duels will allow you to climb the ladder and improve your champion collection, expanding your possibilities and letting you craft strategies as original as they are numerous. The goal is simple: push your deck-building and adaptation skills to the limit. The many champion abilities, along with their passives, offer this opportunity. Rest assured, with SPAM, monotony doesn't exist. You'll need numerous qualities to gain the upper hand on your opponent. So, step into the arena and become the best Spamer!
name: SPAM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 2 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Video memory
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: SPAM is a F2P online card game. Jump into dynamic combat where you must adapt to your opponents and try to impose your strategy. Collect new cards through your victories and create a devastating combo, because with SPAM, the possibilities are endless.
supported_languages: French, English, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
